channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0153; 03:36AM; 3542 E 3rd St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45itcIP" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45itcIP</a>; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters responded to a one-story row-of-commercials with heavy fire showing. Crews used defensive firefighting tactics (from the exterior only) and set up ladder pipes and other heavy streams to attack the fire. The first 30 firefighters extinguished the flames in just 19 minutes. Crews will remain on scene for an extended period of time to chase down hidden hot spots and overhaul the building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E25 E3 E4 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0153; 03:17AM; 3539 E 3rd St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RdtECs" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RdtECs</a>; #BoyleHeights; One-story row of commercials with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E25 E3 E4 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1900; 11:34PM; 1107 E 118th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VazNAz" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VazNAz</a>; #GreenMeadows; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with heavy smoke showing. Crews made entry with hose lines and discovered heavy fire in the attic. Firefighters ventilated (cut holes in) the roof to allow the heavy smoke to escape, while firefighters below made access through the ceiling to extinguish the flames in 19 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 E21 E221 E233 E264 E33 E65 EM13 RA264 RA64 RA65 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover with Entrapment; INC#1835; 10:20PM; EB 118 Fwy x 210 Fwy; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4e69F2h" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4e69F2h</a>; #Pacoima; Firefighters responded to the scene of a multi-vehicle collision, with rollover and entrapment, resulting in three people needing medical aid. Crews extricated two trapped victims from the wreckage, using hydraulic rescue tools. Both trapped patients were transported to a nearby trauma center in critical condition. A third patient was transported in moderate condition. CHP Log #2723. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 E98 EM15 RA75 RA91 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1625; 07:54PM; 8808 Vista Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45cPjQW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45cPjQW</a>; #PlayaDelRey; Firefighters responded to a multi-vehicle collision resulting in at least 5 patients, including one fatality. Firefighters extricated two patients, and transported a total of four patients (3 critical & 1 in fair condition) to local hospitals (ages/genders: 18M, 16M, 18F, 30F). The deceased (unknown age/gender) remains inside one of the wrecked vehicles, with LAPD en route for the investigation.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E43 E5 E62 E67 E95 EM11 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA43 RA59 RA62 RA867 RA92 RA95 T5 T63; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1610; 07:44PM; 5600 N Balboa Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4c1hdBq" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4c1hdBq</a>; #Encino; Firefighters arrived to find a three-vehicle collision with entrapment. Crews deployed hydraulic rescue tools and extricated two patients. A total of three patients were evaluated/treated on scene. Two were transported in critical condition to a local trauma center (unknown age/gender). The third patient declined transport. LAPD Inc #4157. Nothing further. ; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E100 E288 E293 E83 E88 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA83 RA839 RA88 RA93 T88 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1572; 07:33PM; 2455 E Cincinnati St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xdMUc1" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xdMUc1</a>; #BoyleHeights; Twenty-six firefighters responded to the burning unoccupied one-story home and extinguished the fire in 14 minutes, using a combination of interior fire attack and rooftop ventilation to put a swift stop to the advancing flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E17 E201 E202 E25 E4 RA10 RA4 RA804 SQ21 T1 T2; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1572; 07:19PM; 2456 E Cincinnati St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aU3z21" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aU3z21</a>; #BoyleHeights; One-story home (vacant?) with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E17 E201 E202 E25 E4 RA4 RA804 SQ21 T1 T2; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0067; 02:00AM; 2421 E Lancaster Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3x1OtK4" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3x1OtK4</a>; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters responded to a three- story residential building under construction to find heavy fire showing. Firefighters had previously been to this property for a previous fire, which presented dangers of a weakened structure and existing holes in the roof and floors. Ultimately, it took the first 32 firefighters 28 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC13 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E25 EM1 RA1 RA2 RA801 SO1 SQ21 T1 T2 T3; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC13 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E25 EM1 RA2 RA801 SO1 SQ21 T1 T2 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
